attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is more than obvious that no matter how many signatures an e-petition gets the most that will come of it is an email from Tony and a couple of paragraphs about how it is not going to happen for this reason or that reason.

Scrap this complete waste of time, Tony. Leave behind at least one legacy yopu can be proud of!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
